75932.床に 魔法陣が描かれている。\nしかし 何も起こらないようだ。:

102900.倒したトロルキングから 創生の魔力があふれ\n神秘のゴブレットを 満たした。\n:
The creation magic overflows from the defeated troll king and fills up the mysterious goblet.
Let's return to Falchion.

112823.どこからともなく 声が聞こえる……。: From out of nowhere, a voice can heard...

112824.<pipipi_high>「聞こえますか <pc>。\n 私です。ファルシオンで:
Hear me, . It is I, Falchion.
Please, to fill the mysterious goblet with creation magic, you must enter Creation Cave and defeat Troll King.
A Troll King should be around the center of Creation Cave, in a place called the ''Pathway to Emptiness''.
Those inhabiting nearby Creation Cave, should have amassed magic power into their bodies. I leave it to you, .
